extension.dc:title: Plinian Core Legislation Extension
extension.name: Legislation
extension.dc:subject: plic:Legislation; dwc:Taxon
extension.dc:description: National and/or regional proposed law or group of laws.

property.name: LegislationName
property.dc:description: Word or phrase to designate the law or group of laws.
property.examples: Environment Protection and Biodiversity Conservation Act 1999 (EPBC Act)

property.name: ProtectionLegalStatus
property.dc:description: Description of the legal status. Controlled vocabulary is recommended.
property.examples: "Endangered", "Sensitive to habitat alteration", "Vulnerable" and "Of special interest".

property.name: LegislationRead
property.dc:description: The official document containing the piece of legislation.

property.name: legislationStatus
property.dc:description: Whether a piece of legislation is in force, or superseded, etc. A controlled vocabulary is recommended

property.name: legislationType
property.dc:description: Category of the piece of legislation. Controlled vocabulary is recommended

property.name: legalNorm
property.dc:description: A norm in which the piece of legislation is included. Norms are general legal principles that are widely accepted. This acceptance is evidenced in a number of ways, such as international agreements, national legislation, domestic and international judicial decisions, and scholarly writings.
property.examples: Law 243 of 1995, International Convention for the Protection of Plants Varieties.
